metadata.name: Linux Network Service Scanning Tools Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of network scanning and reconnaisance tools. These tools can be used for the enumeration of local or remote network services for example.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND ((endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/nc')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/ncat')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/netcat')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/socat'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --listen ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -l '))) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/autorecon')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/hping')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/hping2')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/hping3')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/naabu')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/nmap')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/nping')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/telnet')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/zenmap'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of network scanning and reconnaisance tools. These tools can be used for the enumeration of local or remote network services for example.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1046/T1046.md, https://github.com/projectdiscovery/naabu, https://github.com/Tib3rius/AutoRecon
